TextView.android:text: Jason Coffman approached a host of reporters microphones on Thursday, and with a quiver in his voice, shared the news he had feared receiving all morning: His eldest son was among the 12 people killed in Wednesday nights shooting at the Borderline Bar and Grill in Thousand Oaks, California.
